title: Stuck on Authenticating!!
body: I just lagged in the rank queue and I tried to restart the client. Then I stuck on Authenticating forever, but when I tried to login and stuck on Authenticating, my account was online in my friend's friend list. Also I tried another account, it didn't have this problem. Anyone can help me ??!!! TnT

replies.body: wow i am not the only one ditto dude
u have this problem too ??  I still have this problem now
yes bro same is happening from last 4 days its saturday now cant play league on my holiday
Do u know what's the problem? I can log in other accounts except this. So confused
My problem got solved automatically. wheeww

I went ahead and looked into your account to see what might be keeping from logging in on that specific account. It looks like someone else might have gained access to your account, so hit up our account team through their [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) to make sure your account is safe and secure!
Thank you very much! May i reply here if i have further problems？
Abssolutely. Just make sure to reply to one of my posts and it will alert me ^_^!
I have recovered my password but it didn't help. What should be the problem!! I don't want to lose my account TNT-
I did the account recovery form now what?
Me too I also have the same problem.... except it doesn't say I am online but it just sits on authenticating and won't ever log in T_T
Might be worthwhile to change PW to email and account to be safe :)
it also Says I am online too
I still cannot login . How about u
I have done recover my password, but it didn't help
